thread.title: Dry, windy conditions have York County under red flag warning
thread.title_full: Dry, windy conditions have York County under red flag warning

author: , York Dispatch
title: Dry, windy conditions have York County under red flag warning
text: Dry, windy conditions have York County under red flag warning The National Weather Service in State College has issued a Red Flag Warning for York and surrounding counties. The warning will be in effect from noon until 7 p.m. Friday. A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring or are imminent due to a combination of strong winds, low relative humidity and dry fuels. Any fires that develop may quickly get out of control and become difficult to contain. Rapid wildfire growth and spread expected in these conditions and outdoor burning is not recommended. Sustained winds will be between 10 and 20 mph, with gusts up to 30 mph possible, and a relative humidity level of around 29%. Otherwise, York County has a slight chance of showers on a mostly cloudy Friday, with a high temperature near 76. Friday night, it will be mostly clear, with a low around 40. [>> Please consider subscribing to support local journalism. ](https://cm.yorkdispatch.com/specialoffer/) The weekend will have mostly clear skies. Here is the outlook: Saturday: It will be sunny, with a high near 59. Saturday nNight: It will be mostly clear, with a low around 33. Sunday: It will be mostly sunny, with a high near 60. Sunday night: There is a slight chance of showers after 2 a.m. Otherwise, it will be mostly cloudy, with a low around 43. Monday: It will be partly sunny, with a high near 66. Monday night: It will be mostly cloudy, with a low around 52. Tuesday: It will be partly sunny, with a high near 74. Tuesday night: There is a 30% chance of showers after 2 a.m. Otherwise, it will be partly cloudy, with a low around 61. Wednesday: There is a 30% chance of showers. Otherwise, it will be partly sunny, with a high near 75. Wednesday night: There is a chance of showers. Otherwise, it will be mostly cloudy, with a low around 52.
